column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Seeing that Opentable only had 10 pm reservations
column2: I called in on a birthday and they were able to seat us at a booth. We had returned to Bavette for the dry aged ribeye
column3: which was nicely seasoned and grilled and as delicious as we had remembered. The ambience and noise level is perfect and unique compared to a regular boothed steak house.
